channel.title: conferences on Tim Stuart
channel.description: Recent content in conferences on Tim Stuart

item.title: Lorne Genome 2016 presentation
item.description: This week I presented some recent work at the Lorne Genome conference. It was my first time at Lorne and it’s a fantastic meeting with lots of interesting talks. It was great to see so many people getting interested in transposon biology too! Here are a few links to the work I was presenting: TEPID TE presence/absence variant discovery software: https://github.com/ListerLab/TEPID Poster: https://dx.doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.2082757.v1 Manuscript: http://dx.doi.org/10.1101/039511
